'Play' is the second extended player by British band Ride.

The EP was combined with its predecessor [[Ride (EP)|Ride]] to form the [[Smile
(Ride album)|Smile]] mini-album for the US market in July, 1990. Two years
later, in November, 1992, Smile was released the UK, too, after the British EPs
had gone out of print.
